IonoObservationAntennaElementPosition_Fu.description: /// For phased arrays, a 2D array. 1st dimension spans the dimension antenna_element (see phase or amplitude). 2nd dimension spans 3 (x, y, z) Cartesian coordinates.

dimensions.description:
Array of integers of the antenna_element dimensions.
Example: /// Example: [3, 4]
Constraints: No constraints specified.

dimensionName.description:
Array of names for dimensions.
Example: /// Example: ['NAME1', 'NAME2']
Constraints: No constraints specified.

data.description:
Array of 3-element tuples (x,y,z) in km.
Example: /// Example: [[1.23, 0.123]]
Constraints: No constraints specified.
